dict.string: This app requires camera access to capture photos of substations, feeders, and distribution transformers (DTRs) for inspection and documentation purposes.
This app requires access to your location at all times to accurately track and inspect substations, feeders, and distribution transformers (DTRs) during field operations.
This app requires access to your location at all times to accurately track and inspect substations, feeders, and distribution transformers (DTRs) during field operations.
This app requests temporary location access to accurately inspect substations, feeders, and DTRs while performing field operations.

This app needs access to your photo library to save captured photos of substations, feeders, and distribution transformers (DTRs) for inspection and documentation purposes.
This app allows users to capture and upload photos of substations, feeders, and distribution transformers (DTRs) for inspection and documentation purposes..
